quotes: Unfortunately, the two wonderful years were soon about to run out.

organizations.name: JNU
quotes: Perhaps the most important thing I got from JNU was a sense of what politics in the Indian context meant.

organizations.name: Harvard
quotes: Instead, I applied to Harvard, which I knew from Love Story, and to Berkeley and Stanford, because I had heard of Gerard Debreu and Kenneth Arrow.

organizations.name: Princeton
quotes: this is why I missed out on applying to Princeton and MIT, which were probably the two best places for someone like me.

roles.title: student
quotes: My grades were good. My teachers and my parents wanted me to apply for a PhD.
I was a good student, even a very good one, but at a university which had never sent anyone to Harvard.

roles.title: activists
quotes: I learnt activism from the activists, pamphleteering from the master pamphleteers, slogans from the demon­strators.
